mapper.select: SELECT PROD_NO AS prodNo , PROD_TITLE AS prodTitle , PROD_PRICE AS prodPrice , PROD_IMG AS prodImage , DISCOUNT_RATE AS discountRate , PROD_SELLER AS prodSeller , PROD_HITS AS prodHits , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) AS reviewCnt , (SELECT SUM(REW_GRADE) FROM REVIEW WHERE PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) AS starGrade FROM PRODUCT P WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
